Artwork

I sho?

WHAT'S UP?

I'm Timur, the soul behind the needle, living and breathing tattoos. My art lives in the spaces between realism, surrealism, trash-polka, and blackwork. Tattooing for me is not just work; it's a piece of my essence etched forever. Operating out of Katowice and Wroclaw, Redberry Tattoo Studio is where my unique style comes to life.

'I sho? Look at me, bitch!'—this is where art meets skin.

Artwork

I sho?

WHAT'S UP?

This series, which you can feast your eyes on at the convention, is a testament to my journey, my questions, and my declarations in the world of art. 'I sho?' - I constantly ask myself, pushing the boundaries of my creativity. Each painting is a chapter of my soul, a 'look at me, bitch!' moment where I dare the world to see through my eyes. The strokes, colors, and themes, they all scream 'eto maya galereya!', proudly showcasing the essence of who I am and what I stand for. So, dive in, explore, and let's have a 'look at me, bitch!' journey together through my gallery.

OIL WHISPERS

This series, which you can feast your eyes on at the convention, is a collection of my latest oil paintings.

Biography

Kto ya?

WHO AM I?

Timur Lysenko, born in 1988, am not just a tattoo artist, graphic designer, craftsman, and painter; I am a creator at heart. Having hailed from Ukraine, I've made Poland my home for the past 13 years. "I sho?" I often find myself asking, as I dive deep into the realms of creating something new, merging various forms of art with a playful rebellion. My inspiration? It's drawn from within, my own subconscious, and the rich tapestry of my surroundings and nature.

Back in the day, I dabbled in making collages with plants and crafted graphics that spoke volumes. But let me tell you, "luk et mi bich!", painting has become the cornerstone of my artistic endeavors. It's not just a branch of my activities; it's the root, the soul.

Among the narratives I've spun into color and form, Dresology stands out – it's the first of several series of paintings I've birthed. ions, and my declarations in the world of art. 'I sho?' - I constantly ask myself, pushing the boundaries of my creativity. Each painting is a chapter of my soul, a 'look at me, bitch!' moment where I dare the world to see through my eyes. The strokes, colors, and themes, they all scream 'eto maya galereya!', proudly showcasing the essence of who I am and what I stand for. So, dive in, explore, and let's have a 'look at me, bitch!' journey together through my gallery.
